definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

sentences.english: In the case of the Earth, the amount of sunlight absorbed is 239 watts per square metre.
sentences.chinese: 以地球为例，每平米的阳光吸收量为239瓦特。

sentences.english: Meal Linshui constructs, business area more than 1000 square meters.
sentences.chinese: 餐吧邻水而建，营业面积一千多平米。

sentences.english: There is a bed, a sofa and three chairs in this 25 square-meters room.
sentences.chinese: 这个25平米的房间有一张床，一张沙发和三把椅子。

sentences.english: At one point, the blaze spread across 10-thousand square meters.
sentences.chinese: 大火一度蔓延到1万平米的范围。

sentences.english: Five bedrooms and two Hall three Methodist, 272 square meters, the maximum area of single-family Yat Valley.
sentences.chinese: 五房两厅三卫，272平米，逸翠谷最大面积的独栋。

sentences.english: This project which locates at the north of Xi'an is about 300,000 sq. m of construction.
sentences.chinese: 该项目位于西安市北二环，建筑面积约30万平米。

sentences.english: square metres of land in the rst quarter;Wanke also acquired 5.62 million square metres of additional land reserves in the rst half of this year.
sentences.chinese: 万科在今年上半年也追加了562万平米的土地储备。

sentences.english: Some room must be left for faith.
sentences.chinese: 给信仰留个几平米，那是必须滴。

sentences.english: The covered area of business bar is 500 square meters.
sentences.chinese: 特色商务吧面积500余平米，布局新颖，明亮。

sentences.english: The price for both apartments were around 7,000 yuan a square meter at that time.
sentences.chinese: 当时两处房产的价格都在每平米7000元左右。

sentences.english: The square is 300m2 asphalted with demarcations in granite.
sentences.chinese: 这个广场有300平米由沥青和其他材料划分。

sentences.english: Prices start at about $800 per square meter.
Company existing standard workshop 50,000 square meters.
sentences.chinese: 公司现有标准厂房5万平米。

sentences.english: Do you have the heart to live in a 10-square-meter room?
sentences.chinese: 你忍心蜗居在不到10平米的小屋里吗？

sentences.english: Up to 260 kilograms per square meter and must not break.
sentences.chinese: 每平米可达260公斤且决无破裂。

sentences.english: A 9-sq-m space can also offer you quasi-villa service?
sentences.chinese: 9平米的空间也能建别墅式享受？

definition: square (as in square foot, square mile, square root)
area (of a floor, piece of land etc)/surface area/tract of land
floor area/occupied area/footprint (of a building, piece of equipment etc)
square foot (unit of area equal to 0.093 m²)
classifier for fields/unit of area equal to one fifteenth of a hectare
configuration of rooms in a residence (e.g. 3BR 2 Bath)
